creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: bi-fold card with blue and green abstract image: four dark blue cones along bottom; larger aquamarine cone at center overlapping green and blue backgrounds spotted with white; blue and white pattern at top; on back: block printed red letters reading, "Merry Christmas / and a Happy New Year / Yoshida Family"
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
title: Greeting Cards to H.E. Robison
